phylocomr
  • Reference
  • Articles

pd - Faith's index of phylogenetic diversity

pd - Faith's index of phylogenetic diversity

ph_pd(sample, phylo)

Arguments

sample
(data.frame/character) sample data.frame or path to a sample file. required
phylo
(character/phylo) phylogeny as a phylo object or a newick string (will be written to a temp file if provided) - or a path to a file with a newick string. required

Value

A single data.frame, with the colums:

  • sample - community name/label
  • ntaxa - number of taxa
  • PD - Faith's phylogenetic diversity
  • treeBL - tree BL
  • propTreeBL - proportion tree BL

See also

Other phylogenetic-diversity: ph_rao

Examples

sfile <- system.file("examples/sample_comstruct", package = "phylocomr")
pfile <- system.file("examples/phylo_comstruct", package = "phylocomr")

# from data.frame
sampledf <- read.table(sfile, header = FALSE,
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
phylo_str <- readLines(pfile)
ph_pd(sample = sampledf, phylo = phylo_str)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 5
#>    sample ntaxa    PD treeBL propTreeBL
#>     <chr> <int> <dbl>  <dbl>      <dbl>
#> 1  clump1     8    16     62      0.258
#> 2 clump2a     8    17     62      0.274
#> 3 clump2b     8    18     62      0.290
#> 4  clump4     8    22     62      0.355
#> 5    even     8    30     62      0.484
#> 6  random     8    27     62      0.435

# from files
sample_str <- paste0(readLines(sfile), collapse = "\n")
sfile2 <- tempfile()
cat(sample_str, file = sfile2, sep = '\n')
pfile2 <- tempfile()
phylo_str <- readLines(pfile)
cat(phylo_str, file = pfile2, sep = '\n')

ph_pd(sample = sfile2, phylo = pfile2)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 5
#>    sample ntaxa    PD treeBL propTreeBL
#>     <chr> <int> <dbl>  <dbl>      <dbl>
#> 1  clump1     8    16     62      0.258
#> 2 clump2a     8    17     62      0.274
#> 3 clump2b     8    18     62      0.290
#> 4  clump4     8    22     62      0.355
#> 5    even     8    30     62      0.484
#> 6  random     8    27     62      0.435
